verses.verse: Jacob <S%H3290><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> on his way, <S%H1870><s%> and the angels <S%H4397><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> met him. <S%H6293><s%>

When he saw them, <S%H7200><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "This is God <S%H430><s%>'s army. <S%H4264><s%>" He called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of that place <S%H4725><s%> Mahanaim. <S%H4266><s%>

Jacob <S%H3290><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> in front of him <S%H6440><s%> to Esau, <S%H6215><s%> his brother, <S%H251><s%> to the land <S%H7704><s%> of Seir, <S%H8165><s%> the field <S%H7704><s%> of Edom. <S%H123><s%>

He commanded <S%H6680><s%> them, <S%H559><s%> saying, "This is what you shall tell <S%H559><s%> my lord, <S%H113><s%> Esau: <S%H6215><s%> <S%H5650><s%> 'This is what your servant, Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> says. <S%H559><s%> I have lived <S%H1481><s%> as a foreigner with Laban, <S%H3837><s%> and stayed until now. <S%H309><s%>

I have cattle, <S%H7794><s%> donkeys, <S%H2543><s%> flocks, <S%H6629><s%> male servants, <S%H5650><s%> and female servants. <S%H8198><s%> I have sent <S%H7971><s%> to tell <S%H5046><s%> my lord, <S%H113><s%> that I may find <S%H4672><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in your sight. <S%H5869><s%>'"

The messengers <S%H4397><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> to Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "We came <S%H935><s%> to your brother <S%H251><s%> Esau. <S%H6215><s%> Not only that, <S%H1980><s%> but he comes to meet you, <S%H7125><s%> and four hundred <S%H3967><s%> men with him. <S%H376><s%>"

Then Jacob <S%H3290><s%> was greatly <S%H3966><s%> afraid <S%H3372><s%> and was distressed. <S%H3334><s%> He divided <S%H2673><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> who were with him, <S%H6629><s%> and the flocks, and the herds, <S%H1241><s%> and the camels, <S%H1581><s%> into two <S%H8147><s%> companies; <S%H4264><s%>

and he said, <S%H559><s%> "If Esau <S%H6215><s%> comes <S%H935><s%> to the one <S%H259><s%> company, <S%H4264><s%> and strikes it, <S%H5221><s%> then the company <S%H4264><s%> which is left <S%H7604><s%> will escape. <S%H6413><s%>"

Jacob <S%H3290><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "God <S%H430><s%> of my father <S%H1><s%> Abraham, <S%H85><s%> and God <S%H430><s%> of my father <S%H1><s%> Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> who said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H7725><s%> 'Return to your country, <S%H776><s%> and to your relatives, <S%H4138><s%> and I will do you good, <S%H3190><s%>'

I am not worthy of the least <S%H6994><s%> of all the loving kindnesses, <S%H2617><s%> and of all the truth, <S%H571><s%> which you have shown <S%H6213><s%> to your servant; <S%H5650><s%> for with just my staff <S%H4731><s%> I passed over <S%H5674><s%> this Jordan; <S%H3383><s%> and now I have become two <S%H8147><s%> companies. <S%H4264><s%>

Please deliver me <S%H5337><s%> from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of my brother, <S%H251><s%> from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Esau: <S%H6215><s%> for I fear <S%H3373><s%> him, <S%H935><s%> lest he come and strike me, <S%H5221><s%> and the mothers <S%H517><s%> with <S%H5921><s%> the children. <S%H1121><s%>

You said, <S%H559><s%> <S%H3190><s%> 'I will surely do you good, <S%H3190><s%> and make <S%H7760><s%> your seed <S%H2233><s%> as the sand <S%H2344><s%> of the sea, <S%H3220><s%> which can't <S%H5608><s%> be numbered because there are so many. <S%H7230><s%>'"

He lodged <S%H3885><s%> there that night, <S%H3915><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> from that which he had <S%H935><s%> with him, <S%H3027><s%> a present <S%H4503><s%> for Esau, <S%H6215><s%> his brother: <S%H251><s%>
two hundred <S%H3967><s%> female goats <S%H5795><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> male goats, <S%H8495><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> ewes <S%H7353><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> rams, <S%H352><s%>

thirty <S%H7970><s%> milk <S%H3243><s%> camels <S%H1581><s%> and their colts, <S%H1121><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> cows, <S%H6510><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> bulls, <S%H6499><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> female donkeys <S%H860><s%> and ten <S%H6235><s%> foals. <S%H5895><s%>

He delivered <S%H5414><s%> them into the hands <S%H3027><s%> of his servants, <S%H5650><s%> every herd <S%H5739><s%> by itself, <S%H559><s%> and said to his servants, <S%H5650><s%> "Pass over <S%H5674><s%> before me, <S%H6440><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> a space <S%H7305><s%> between <S%H996><s%> herd <S%H5739><s%> and <S%H996><s%> herd. <S%H5739><s%>"

He commanded <S%H6680><s%> the foremost, <S%H7223><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "When Esau, <S%H6215><s%> my brother, <S%H251><s%> meets you, <S%H7592><s%> and asks you, <S%H7592><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H7592><s%> 'Whose are you? Where are you going? <S%H6440><s%> Whose are these before you?'

Then you shall say, <S%H559><s%> <S%H5650><s%> 'They are your servant, Jacob <S%H3290><s%>'s. It is a present <S%H4503><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> to my lord, <S%H113><s%> Esau. <S%H6215><s%> Behold, <S%H310><s%> he also is behind us.'"

He <S%H6680><s%> commanded <S%H1571><s%> also the second, <S%H8145><s%> and the third, <S%H7992><s%> and all that followed <S%H1980><s%> the herds, <S%H5739><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "This is how <S%H1697><s%> you shall speak <S%H1696><s%> to Esau, <S%H6215><s%> when you find him. <S%H4672><s%>

You <S%H559><s%> shall say, <S%H1571><s%> 'Not only that, but behold, <S%H559><s%> your servant, <S%H5650><s%> Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> is behind us. <S%H310><s%>'" For, <S%H559><s%> he said, "I will appease <S%H3722><s%> him <S%H6440><s%> with the present <S%H4503><s%> that goes before me, <S%H6440><s%> and afterward <S%H310><s%> I will see <S%H7200><s%> his face. <S%H6440><s%> Perhaps he will accept <S%H5375><s%> me. <S%H6440><s%>"
So <S%H5674><s%> the present <S%H4503><s%> passed over <S%H5674><s%> before him, <S%H6440><s%> and he himself lodged <S%H3885><s%> that night <S%H3915><s%> in the camp. <S%H4264><s%>

He rose up <S%H6965><s%> that night, <S%H3915><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> his two <S%H8147><s%> wives, <S%H802><s%> and his two <S%H8147><s%> handmaids, <S%H8198><s%> and his eleven <S%H6240><s%> sons, <S%H3206><s%> and passed over <S%H5674><s%> the ford <S%H4569><s%> of the Jabbok. <S%H2999><s%>
He took them, <S%H3947><s%> and sent them <S%H3947><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> the stream, <S%H5674><s%> and sent over that which he had.
Jacob <S%H3290><s%> was left <S%H3498><s%> alone, <S%H79><s%> and wrestled with a man <S%H376><s%> there until the breaking <S%H5927><s%> of the day. <S%H7837><s%>

When he saw <S%H7200><s%> that he didn't <S%H3201><s%> prevail against him, <S%H5060><s%> he touched the hollow of his thigh, <S%H3409><s%> and the hollow <S%H3709><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>'s thigh <S%H3409><s%> was strained, <S%H3363><s%> as he wrestled. <S%H79><s%>

The man said, <S%H559><s%> "Let me go, <S%H7971><s%> for the day <S%H7837><s%> breaks. <S%H5927><s%>" Jacob said, <S%H559><s%> "I won't <S%H7971><s%> let you go, unless <S%H518><s%> you bless me. <S%H1288><s%>"
He said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H8034><s%> "What is your name?" He said, <S%H559><s%> "Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>"

He said, <S%H559><s%> "Your name <S%H8034><s%> will no longer be called <S%H559><s%> Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> but Israel; <S%H3478><s%> for you have <S%H8280><s%> fought with God <S%H430><s%> and with men, <S%H582><s%> and have prevailed. <S%H3201><s%>"

Jacob <S%H3290><s%> asked <S%H7592><s%> him, <S%H559><s%> "Please tell <S%H5046><s%> me your name. <S%H8034><s%>" He said, <S%H559><s%> "Why is it <S%H2088><s%> that you ask <S%H7592><s%> what my name <S%H8034><s%> is? <S%H1288><s%>" He blessed him there.

Jacob <S%H3290><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the place <S%H4725><s%> Peniel: <S%H6439><s%> for, <S%H7200><s%> he said, "I have seen God <S%H430><s%> face <S%H6440><s%> to face, <S%H6440><s%> and my life <S%H5315><s%> is preserved. <S%H5337><s%>"
The sun <S%H8121><s%> rose <S%H2224><s%> on him as he passed over <S%H5674><s%> Peniel, <S%H6439><s%> and he limped <S%H6760><s%> because of his thigh. <S%H3409><s%>

Therefore the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> don't <S%H398><s%> eat the sinew <S%H1517><s%> of the hip, <S%H5384><s%> which is on the hollow <S%H3709><s%> of the thigh, <S%H3409><s%> to this day, <S%H3117><s%> because he touched <S%H5060><s%> the hollow <S%H3709><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>'s thigh <S%H3409><s%> in the sinew <S%H1517><s%> of the hip. <S%H5384><s%>
